publications.name: Optimization of in vitro cell culture conditions suitable for the cholangiocarcinoma stem cell study
publications.summary: This study focuses on optimizing in vitro cell culture conditions for cholangiocarcinoma stem cell research, specifically examining factors like culture media, seeding density, and 2D vs. 3D culture methods to facilitate high-throughput drug testing and sustainable resource utilization.

publications.name: A live single-cell reporter system reveals drug-induced plasticity of a cancer stem cell-like population in cholangiocarcinoma
publications.summary: This study presents a live single-cell reporter system that uncovers the drug-induced plasticity of a cancer stem cell-like population in cholangiocarcinoma, providing insights into the mechanisms of cancer treatment resistance.

projects.name: Cholangiocarcinoma Stem Cell
projects.summary: This research introduces a live single-cell reporter system that reveals the drug-induced plasticity of a cancer stem cell-like population in cholangiocarcinoma. The findings offer valuable insights into the mechanisms underlying resistance to cancer treatment.
